mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipient_mail VALUES(default, #{parent_seq}, #{sender}, #{receipient}, #{title} , #{contents}, #{write_date}, default, default, default);
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM receipient_mail r JOIN member m ON r.receipient = m.id LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON r.seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE seq=#{seq} group by r.seq;
SELECT m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email FROM receipient_mail r JOIN member m ON r.sender = m.id WHERE seq=#{seq} group by r.seq;

SELECT r.sender, r.receipient, r.title, r.write_date, r.is_read, w.*, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM waste_mail w JOIN receipient_mail r ON r.seq = w.parent_seq JOIN member m ON r.receipient = m.id LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON w.parent_seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE r.sender = #{member_id} GROUP BY w.parent_seq ORDER BY ws_seq DESC;

SELECT r.sender, r.receipient, r.title, r.write_date, r.is_read, w.*, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM waste_receipient_mail w JOIN receipient_mail r ON r.seq = w.parent_seq JOIN member m ON r.receipient = m.id LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON w.parent_seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE r.receipient = #{member_id} GROUP BY w.parent_seq ORDER BY wr_seq DESC;

SELECT r.*, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM receipient_mail r JOIN member m ON r.sender = m.id LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON r.parent_seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE r.receipient = #{receipient} AND r.is_delete = false AND r.sender!= r.receipient group by r.parent_seq ORDER BY r.seq DESC;

SELECT r.seq, r.parent_seq, r.sender, r.receipient, r.title, r.contents, r.write_date, r.is_read, s.is_delete, s.is_mark, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM receipient_mail r JOIN member m ON r.receipient = m.id LEFT JOIN sender_mail s ON r.seq = s.seq LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON r.seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE r.sender = #{sender} AND s.is_delete = false AND r.sender != r.receipient GROUP BY r.seq ORDER BY r.seq DESC;

SELECT r.*, m.name, m.group_name, m.position, m.email, f.* FROM receipient_mail r JOIN member m ON r.receipient = m.id LEFT JOIN mail_file f ON r.parent_seq = f.fparent_seq WHERE r.sender = #{sender} AND sender=receipient AND r.is_delete = false group by r.parent_seq ORDER BY r.seq DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE receipient_mail SET is_delete=true WHERE seq=#{seq};
UPDATE sender_mail SET is_delete=true WHERE seq=#{seq};
UPDATE receipient_mail SET is_read=true WHERE seq=#{seq};
